channel.title: Adding KC + Pkpoints to quest tab [DELTA]
channel.description:
I am trying to add the bandos kill count and pk points to my quest tab. I am not sure exactly what I have to do here. I have googled around and found some stuff, but nothing that really explains what everything means. I want it to come up as "Killcount:##". So can somebody please explain to me how to make it show the players live killcount. [code]c.sendQuest("Killcount:", 7333); [/code]
EDIT: I figured out how to get it to show up now. But is there anyway to make it update in real time? EDIT: Added the real time things under "public boolean process()" it all works now but is there a better place to put it?

item.title: Adding KC + Pkpoints to quest tab [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Sassafras95 Sassafras95
item.description:
@Sassafras95 wrote:

Well thanks for nothing and wasting my time. By the way Sassafras isn’t Marijuana. If you were trying to say my name is in reference to a drug you should have said snort some Molly. But good try buddy Have a good one.

Read full topic

I am trying to add the bandos kill count and pk points to my quest tab. I am not sure exactly what I have to do here. I have googled around and found some stuff, but nothing that really explains what everything means. I want it to come up as "Killcount:##".
